generalInfo.title: Central Library
generalInfo.description: The Central Library at GEC Barmer is a state-of-the-art facility designed to support academic excellence and research. With a vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources, we provide an ideal environment for learning and intellectual growth.

facilities.title: Reading Hall
facilities.description: Spacious reading hall with comfortable seating arrangements and natural lighting

facilities.title: Digital Resource Center
facilities.description: Computer lab with high-speed internet access for digital research

facilities.title: Discussion Rooms
facilities.description: Private rooms for group discussions and project work

facilities.title: E-Learning Zone
facilities.description: Dedicated space for accessing online courses and digital learning materials

services.title: Book Issue & Return
services.description: Easy book borrowing system with online renewal facility

services.title: Reference Service
services.description: Professional assistance in finding and using library resources

services.title: Document Delivery
services.description: Photocopy and scanning services for library materials

rules: Students must carry their ID cards to enter the library
Maximum 3 books can be issued for 14 days
Books can be renewed online if not reserved by others
Maintain silence in the library premises
No food or drinks allowed inside the library
Mobile phones should be kept in silent mode
